description:
The Agency is tasked with finding and delivering an important document. A man is hit and killed by a truck. His identity shocks Atsushi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Part 1: Herurisu! / Part 2: Portrait of a Father
Partie 1, Cherrirs / Partie 2, Le portrait d’un père
Sono Ichi: Herurisu! / Sono Ni: Chichi no Shouzou
Teil 1: Hellis / Teil 2: Portrait eines Vaters
其の一 ヘルリス! / 其の二 父の肖像
